document.bingtitle: How to Figure a Restaurant Chain's Yearly Revenue | eHow.com
document.webtitle: How to Figure a Restaurant Chains Yearly Revenue | eHow.com
document.description: The university says sales for the year equals the number of days open times the number of seats times the average daily seat turnover times the average check.
